reviews.text: Very poor. Waited until I had lived in the area at least 2 months to see if anything improved after feedback & it hasn’t. Machines often don’t work, either don’t take notes or don’t take change (or both) often no one behind the desk, and most notably - advertise as a station with a toilet & disabled access - and have neither available. It has been out of order since May.
It's not to bad now the lighting has improved on the platform apart from that just a normal  station

Offers everything you need at a train station, semi covered platforms, machines to buy tickets by card and cash and a service attendant to answer questions, has train information in easy to see spots and large enough signs for anyone to read from any range.

Some of the platforms could do with a clean and some trains are often a minute or two late but that isn't the stations fault.  Overall a decent station with decent service
Just your standard train station....could do with modifying but then so could most stations
It gets crowdy sometimes but its good overall
